# HPKEPublicKeySerialization

**Protocol**

A type that [doc://com.apple.CryptoKit/documentation/CryptoKit/HPKE] uses to encode the public key.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency protocol HPKEPublicKeySerialization : Sendable
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:kem:)**: Creates a public key from an encoded representation.

## Instance Methods

- **hpkeRepresentation(kem:)**: Creates an encoded representation of the public key.

## Inherits From

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

## Inherited By

- HPKEDiffieHellmanPublicKey
- HPKEKEMPublicKey

## Conforming Types

- Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
- P256.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
- P384.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
- P521.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
- XWingMLKEM768X25519.PublicKey
